item.title: Metric Steiner Tree
item.description: The Metric Steiner Tree Motivation A Steiner Tree is an optimization algorithm for finding asubtree spanning so called terminal vertices. Terminal vertices are the nodes in a network which must spanned by the MST. This problems arise in telecommunication networks, VSLI chip design. This article describes an approximation algorithm for the Metric Steiner Tree Problem Introduction The Steiner Tree Problem (STP) is a graph $G = (V, E)$ along with terminals $R \subset V$.
